column6:
Those with fear in their heart burn at the touch of MAN-THING! Knowing that the Thingster's lurking about, will Spidey be able to summon the courage to save people trapped in a Florida swamp? We ain't tellin' ya here! Pick up the issue!,2006,8
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:Mike Norton | penciller (cover):Cameron Stewart
